Package ohos.agp.components

Interface Component.ScaledListener

  • Enclosing class:
    Component

    public static interface Component.ScaledListener
    Provides callbacks for scale events of a component.

    Scale events include the start, update, and end events.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void onScaleEnd​(Component component, ScaleInfo scaleInfo)
      Listens for and processes scale end events of a component.
      void onScaleStart​(Component component, ScaleInfo scaleInfo)
      Listens for and processes scale start events of a component.
      void onScaleUpdate​(Component component, ScaleInfo scaleInfo)
      Listens for and processes scale update events of a component.

    • Method Detail

      • onScaleStart

        void onScaleStart​(Component component,
                  ScaleInfo scaleInfo)
        Listens for and processes scale start events of a component.
        Parameters:
        component - Indicates the component to scale.
        scaleInfo - Indicates the detailed scale information.

      • onScaleUpdate

        void onScaleUpdate​(Component component,
                   ScaleInfo scaleInfo)
        Listens for and processes scale update events of a component.
        Parameters:
        component - Indicates the component to scale.
        scaleInfo - Indicates the detailed scale information.

      • onScaleEnd

        void onScaleEnd​(Component component,
                ScaleInfo scaleInfo)
        Listens for and processes scale end events of a component.
        Parameters:
        component - Indicates the component to scale.
        scaleInfo - Indicates the detailed scale information.
